QuestData.Title: Rockin' Powder
QuestData.Description: I'll give these pygmies one thing... they sure know how to party! But they're not so clever. I think I've discovered the source of their rockin' powers: Rockin' Powder!$B$BIt turns out that this stuff, which turns them into world-class rockers, is also highly explosive. We must have it!$B$BSo, while you're in there at Oostan to the east, make sure that you pickup a whole bunch of the stuff. Trust me, you're going to need it for what's coming up!
QuestData.CompletionText: Hmm, let me see how much you've got.
QuestData.RewardText: This will do. In fact, it's more than we need. I devised an ingenious idea for a weapon that the boots will be turned into once you get them to Hobart.$B$BHand the powder over and I'll load it into the Super Booster Rocket Boots.
